author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا معشر الملوك قد نزّل النّاموس الأكبر في المنظر الأنور وظهر كلّ أمر مستتر من لدن مالك القدر الّذي به أتت السّاعة وانشقّ القمر وفصّل كلّ أمر محتوم
translation: O kings of the earth! The Most Great Law hath been revealed in this Spot, this scene of transcendent splendor. Every hidden thing hath been brought to light, by virtue of the Will of the Supreme Ordainer, He Who hath ushered in the Last Hour, through Whom the Moon hath been cleft, and every irrevocable decree expounded.
